author: pbs.org
title: PBS NewsHour full episode October 13, 2015
text: Tuesday on the NewsHour, we dig into the evidence of what shot down a Malaysian airliner. Also: How a possible Joe Biden run could influence the Democratic debate, a deadly surge of violence in Israel, a battle between government and tech companies over data, how Congo’s hope can be seen at the movies and a discussion about President Nixon’s deception.
